Package external

Class MockAuthenticationService

java.lang.Object
external.MockAuthenticationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticationService
public class MockAuthenticationService extends Object implements AuthenticationService
A mock Authentication Service Provider implementation for testing. This does not communicate with any real authentication API, just uses local user data to simulate one. To better understand code using the json-simple library, see the following links: https://attacomsian.com/blog/what-is-json https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/json-simple-example https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17351043/how-to-get-absolute-path-to-file-in-resources-folder-of-your-project https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10926353/how-to-read-json-file-into-java-with-simple-json-library

  • Constructor Details

    • MockAuthenticationService

      public MockAuthenticationService() throws URISyntaxException, IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException, NullPointerException
      Load data about all users from a JSON file into memory
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - occurs if the file URI is invalid
      IOException - occurs if the file cannot be opened
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - occurs if the file contains invalid JSON
      NullPointerException - occurs if the file does not exist

      public String login(String username, String password)
      Specified by:
      login in interface AuthenticationService
      Parameters:
      username - unique user identifier
      password - user password corresponding to the email in plaintext
      Returns:
